title: Schema for an Open Contracting Release for Pre-Award Catalogue request

ocid.description: A globally unique identifier for this Contracting Process

id.description: An identifier for this particular release of information

date.description: The date this information is released, it may well be the same as the parent publishedDate, it must not be later than the publishedDate from the parent package. It is used to determine merge order.

tag.description: A value from the codelist that identifies the nature of the release being made

initiationType.description: String specifying the type of initiation process used for this request, taken from the  codelist

title.description: A overall title for this contracting process or release.

description.description: An overall description for this contracting process or release

parties.description: Information on the parties (organisations, economic operators and other participants) who are involved in the contracting process and their roles.

tender.description: The substance of the request and allowed activities

id.title: Tender ID
id.description: An identifier for this tender process. This may be the same as the ocid, or may be drawn from an internally held identifier for this tender.

status.title: Tender status
status.description: The current status of the tender based on the codeslist

procurementMethodModalities.title: Procurement method modalities
procurementMethodModalities.description: The modalities of the procurement method taken from the codelist.

items.title: Items to be procured
items.description: The goods and services to be purchased

procurementMethod.title: Procurement method
procurementMethod.description: Specify tendering method against the codelist

procurementMethodDetails.title: Procurement method details
procurementMethodDetails.description: Additional detail on the procurement method used

mainProcurementCategory.title: Procurement category
mainProcurementCategory.description: The primary category describing the object of this contracting process from codelist

submissionMethod.title: Submission method
submissionMethod.description: The method by which bids must be submitted, in person, written, or electronic auction. Using the [submission method codelist](http://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1-dev/en/schema/codelists/#submission-method)

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: All documents and attachments related to the tender

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: The primary classification for the tender usisng CPV Codelist

lots.title: Lots
lots.description: Details of each lot to be provided here.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: Any target expected for the quantitive metrics of each lot of this contracting process.

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.description: A list of criteria on which offered items will be judged. Mainly based on 'targets'

tenderPeriod.title: Tender period
tenderPeriod.description: The period when the request is open for submissions

enquiryPeriod.title: Enquiry period
enquiryPeriod.description: The period during which invited tenderers may submit questions

enquiries.title: Enquiries
enquiries.description: Questions sent to the procuring entity, and the answers given
